# Changelog
All notable changes to this project will be documented in this file.

### Changed
- Static string namespace requirements to `use` statements.

### Changed
- Updated dependencies

## 1.0.1 - 04.02.2020

### Changed
- Now all the default checkers are loaded

## 1.0.0 - 03.02.2020

Initial release
